author: mandrenguyen
body:
#### PR description:

RelVal workflows 140.60 and 140.61 now run reconstruction on raw and rawprime input from the HI test run.  140.60 replaces a placeholder workflow that used pp data as input. 

#### PR validation:

140.60 and 140.61 were tested. 

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

No backport will be needed.

Question maybe for @cms-sw/pdmv-l2 :  How do I ensure that the raw input data stays staged on disk?

@prebello
title: add heavy-ion Run 3 data RelVal workflows
